bibl.title: The Northern Pastophorium of Nubian Churches: Ideology and Function (on the Basis of Inscriptions and Paintings).
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Argues that the well-established programm observed in the decoration of the northern pastophoria of Nubian churches from the 9th/10th century onwards was a Nubian creation alluding to the function of the northern pastophorium as a place for storing oblations, keeping liturgical implements and liturgical reserve and possibly also celebrating the 'Liturgy of Presanctified Gifts'. - Avec résumé en anglais.
